locale.name: en_US
locale.message: This plugin allows web-based maintenance of translation files.

This area allows the Site Administrator to build, modify and check translations of OJS. This is site-wide and should not be used to customize a single OJS journal. If you correct or create a translation, please consider submitting it to the Public Knowledge Project for distribution with future releases.

This page lists all components of an OJS translation and provides the translator with the opportunity to edit each. A full translation of a translation should contain complete translations of all components.

The export function of this plugin has been deactivated because the configured tar binary cannot be found on this system. Please make sure that you have the tar program installed and then configure the path to the tar binary in config.inc.php's [cli] section!
Enter an entire locale key to search for.
The key "{$key}" is missing from "{$filename}". The English version has been provided as a default.
The key "{$key}" is no longer used and can be removed from "{$filename}".
The locale key "{$key}" in "{$filename}" differs from the reference locale in its use of parameters. Please double-check that it contains all relevant parameters. The mismatching parameter(s) are:
The locale file "{$filename}" is missing or unreadable.
The email message "{$key}" is missing from the translation.
The email message "{$key}" is no longer used and can be removed.
The email message "{$key}" differs from the reference locale in its use of parameters. Please double-check that it contains all relevant parameters. The mismatching parameter(s) are:
Are you sure you wish to reset the file contents?
Are you sure you wish to reset the email contents?
* This file has not yet been translated.
The file "{$filename}" will be created using the English version; you will need to translate all strings in the file. Do you wish to continue?
In the following fields, translate the email template's Title, Body, and Description. The Description is for the Journal Manager's reference only.
Are you sure you wish to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.
Be sure to save any changes made on this page before continuing or they will be lost. Do you wish to continue? If so, any unsaved changes will be lost.
This locale file is not writeable by the server. Any changes you make will not be saved.
These locale files are not writeable by the server. Any changes you make to them will not be saved.
